00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include "qmapplication.h"
00020 #include <calculatorfactory.h>
00021 
00022 using namespace std;
00023 
00024 /*
00025  * Connectivity Graph
00026  */
00027 class QMAppConnectivity : public QMApplication
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     void HelpText() {}
00031 
00032     void AddSpecificOptions(){
00033         _op_desc_specific.add_options()
00034         ("min", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "Minimum value")
00035         ("max", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "Maximum value")
00036         ("scale1", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "Drawing scale factor for bond thickness")
00037         ("scale2", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "Drawing scale factor for spheres")
00038         ("color", boost::program_options::value<int>(), "Bond Color")
00039         ;
00040     }
00041 
00042     void BeginEvaluate(){
00043         //TODO: check if options are actually set, read in from xml file
00044         label=0;
00045         min=_op_vm["min"].as<double>();
00046         max=_op_vm["max"].as<double>();
00047         scale1=_op_vm["scale1"].as<double>();
00048         scale2=_op_vm["scale2"].as<double>();
00049         color=_op_vm["color"].as<int>();
00050         
00051     }
00052 
00053     bool EvaluateFrame(){
00054 
00055         //TODO: make numbering according to frame number
00056         label++;
00057 
00058         //TODO: cleanup following code
00059         FILE* outfile;
00060         FILE* outvmd;
00061         char namepdb[50];
00062         char namevmd[50];
00063         sprintf(namepdb, "connectivity_%04d.pdb", label);
00064         sprintf(namevmd, "connectivity_%04d.vmd", label);
00065         outfile = fopen(namepdb,"w");
00066         outvmd = fopen(namevmd,"w");
00067 
00068         string type;
00069         map < pair <int,int>, double >::iterator it_map; // map of interesting nbs
00070         pair <int,int> poi; // pair of interest
00071         double Joi; // transfer integral of interest
00072         map <pair <int,int>, double > nbmap; // neighbours of interest
00073         CrgUnit* nb1; // 1st charge unit
00074         CrgUnit* nb2; // 2nd charge unit
00075         vec com; // center of mass
00076         double dist; // distance between molecules ignoring PBCs
00077 
00078         fprintf(outfile, "CONNECTIVITY GRAPH \n");
00079         type = "C"; // using Carbon atoms for the centers of mass
00080 
00081         // CrgUnits to pdb file
00082         vector<CrgUnit *> lcharges = _qmtop.CrgUnits();
00083         for (vector<CrgUnit *>::iterator it_crgs = lcharges.begin(); it_crgs != lcharges.end(); it_crgs++){
00084                 com = (*it_crgs)->GetCom();
00085                 //if(zllim<com.getZ() && com.getZ()<zulim && xllim<com.getX() && com.getX()<xulim && yllim<com.getY() && com.getY()<yulim)
00086                     fprintf(outfile, "ATOM  %5d  %3s %3s %5d     %7.3f %7.3f %7.3f\n", (*it_crgs)->getId(), type.c_str(), "CG", (*it_crgs)->getId(), com.getX()*10, com.getY()*10, com.getZ()*10);
00087         }
00088 
00089         // Transfer integrals in given range
00090         QMNBList &nblist = _qmtop.nblist();
00091         for(QMNBList::iterator it_neigh = nblist.begin(); it_neigh!=nblist.end(); it_neigh++){
00092             if( log10((*it_neigh)->calcJeff2()) > min && log10((*it_neigh)->calcJeff2()) < max ){
00093                 nb1 = _qmtop.GetCrgUnit((*it_neigh)->Crg1()->getId());
00094                 nb2 = _qmtop.GetCrgUnit((*it_neigh)->Crg2()->getId());
00095                 dist = abs(nb1->GetCom()-nb2->GetCom());
00096                 if (dist <= (*it_neigh)->dist()) //compare naive distance with distance regarding pbc to ignore bonds over pbc
00097                 {
00098                 //if (dist < _d_nn && zllim<nb1->GetCom().getZ() && nb1->GetCom().getZ()<zulim && xllim<nb1->GetCom().getX()  && nb1->GetCom().getX()<xulim  && yllim<nb1->GetCom().getY()  && nb1->GetCom().getY()<yulim){
00099                     poi.first = nb1->getId();
00100                     poi.second = nb2->getId();
00101                     //use logarithmic thickness scaling
00102                     Joi = -1/log10((*it_neigh)->calcJeff2());// sqrt( (*it_neigh)->calcJeff2() );
00103                     nbmap.insert( pair < pair<int,int>, double > (poi, Joi));
00104                     fprintf(outfile, "CONECT %4d %4d \n", nb1->getId(), nb2->getId());
00105                 //}
00106                 }
00107             }
00108         }
00109         fclose(outfile);
00110 
00111         // vmd file
00112         fprintf(outvmd, "display projection Orthographic\n\n");
00113         fprintf(outvmd, "mol new %s type pdb waitfor all\n", namepdb);
00114         fprintf(outvmd, "color Display {Background} white\n");
00115         fprintf(outvmd, "trans 100 00 0\n");
00116         fprintf(outvmd, "axes location off\n\n");
00117         fprintf(outvmd, "# first define all useful selections\n\n");
00118 
00119         fprintf(outvmd, "set all \"{all}\"\n");
00120 
00121         int i=0;
00122         for ( it_map = nbmap.begin(); it_map != nbmap.end(); ++it_map ){
00123             fprintf(outvmd, "set nbs_%d \"{resid %d or resid %d}\"\n", i, (*it_map).first.first, (*it_map).first.second);
00124             i++;
00125         }
00126 
00127         fprintf(outvmd, "\n\n");
00128         fprintf(outvmd, "set all_rep \"VDW %3.2f 10\"\n", scale2);
00129 
00130         i=0;
00131         for ( it_map = nbmap.begin(); it_map != nbmap.end(); ++it_map ){
00132             fprintf(outvmd, "set nbs_%d_rep \"bonds %3.2f 10\"\n", i, fabs((*it_map).second)*scale1);
00133             i++;
00134         }
00135 
00136         fprintf(outvmd, "\n");
00137         fprintf(outvmd, "# delete old representation\n\n");
00138         fprintf(outvmd, "mol delrep 0 top\n\n");
00139 
00140         fprintf(outvmd, "#create new representation\n\n");
00141         fprintf(outvmd, "mol representation $all_rep\n");
00142         fprintf(outvmd, "mol color ColorID 2\n");
00143         fprintf(outvmd, "mol selection $all\n");
00144         fprintf(outvmd, "mol material Opaque\n");
00145         fprintf(outvmd, "mol addrep top\n\n");
00146 
00147         i=0;
00148         for ( it_map = nbmap.begin(); it_map != nbmap.end(); ++it_map ){
00149             fprintf(outvmd, "mol representation $nbs_%d_rep \n", i);
00150             //if((*it_map).second<0.0){fprintf(outvmd, "mol color ColorID 1\n");}else{fprintf(outvmd, "mol color ColorID 0\n");}
00151             fprintf(outvmd, "mol color ColorID %d\n", color);
00152             fprintf(outvmd, "mol selection $nbs_%d\n", i);
00153             fprintf(outvmd, "mol material Opaque\n");
00154             fprintf(outvmd, "mol addrep top\n\n");
00155             i++;
00156         }
00157 
00158         fclose(outvmd);
00159     }
00160 
00161     void EndEvaluate(){
00162     }
00163 
00164     private:
00165     int label;
00166     int color;
00167     double min, max;
00168     double scale1,scale2;
00169 };
00170 
00171 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00172     QMAppConnectivity qmappcon;
00173     qmappcon.Run(argc, argv);
00174     return (EXIT_SUCCESS);
00175 }
